snippet: LEAD: An investigation has led to the arrest of 52 people suspected of operating a $100 million poaching ring that dealt in tiger, bear, sea lion and rhinoceros parts, state officials announced Tuesday. Twenty-three other people in Southern Califo...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: An investigation has led to the arrest of 52 people suspected of operating a $100 million poaching ring that dealt in tiger, bear, sea lion and rhinoceros parts, state officials announced Tuesday. Twenty-three other people in Southern California are expected to be charged as a result of a 23-month investigation by the California Department of Fish and Game.
